languages.text: {n}Абеляр мрачнеет и стискивает зубы. Косится на вас и посверкивает глазами.{/n}
{n}Abelard's face turns stony and he clenches his jaw. He looks at you, his narrowed eyes glittering with anger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр мрачнеет и стискивает зубы. Косится на вас и посверкивает глазами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard's face turns stony and he clenches his jaw. He looks at you, his narrowed eyes glittering with anger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸色变得像岩石一样冷硬。他咬紧了牙，看着你，狭长的眼睛里闪烁着愤怒的火焰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns stony and he clenches his jaw. He looks at you, his narrowed eyes glittering with anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的脸色变得像岩石一样冷硬。他咬紧了牙，看着你，狭长的眼睛里闪烁着愤怒的火焰。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Abelard se vuelve pétreo y aprieta la mandíbula. Su mirada se fija en ti, con los ojos entrecerrados relucientes de ira.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns stony and he clenches his jaw. He looks at you, his narrowed eyes glittering with anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Abelard se vuelve pétreo y aprieta la mandíbula. Su mirada se fija en ti, con los ojos entrecerrados relucientes de ira.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは顔をこわばらせ、顎をしゃくる。細めた目を怒りに輝かせながら、あなたを見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns stony and he clenches his jaw. He looks at you, his narrowed eyes glittering with anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは顔をこわばらせ、顎をしゃくる。細めた目を怒りに輝かせながら、あなたを見つめていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelards Miene versteinert und er beißt die Zähne zusammen. Er funkelt dich aus engen Schlitzen zornig an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns stony and he clenches his jaw. He looks at you, his narrowed eyes glittering with anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Miene versteinert und er beißt die Zähne zusammen. Er funkelt dich aus engen Schlitzen zornig an.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une expression glaciale se peint sur le visage d'Abélard, qui serre les mâchoires et vous jette un regard noir, brûlant de colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's face turns stony and he clenches his jaw. He looks at you, his narrowed eyes glittering with anger.{/n}

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, taş kesilip çenesini sıkıyor. Öfkeyle parlayan gözlerini kısarak sana bakıyor.{/n}
